00050 static inline void lov_sub_enter(struct lov_io_sub *sub)
00051 {
00052         sub->sub_reenter++;
00053 }
00054 static inline void lov_sub_exit(struct lov_io_sub *sub)
00055 {
00056         sub->sub_reenter--;
00057 }
00058 
00059 static void lov_io_sub_fini(const struct lu_env *env, struct lov_io *lio,
00060                             struct lov_io_sub *sub)
00061 {
00062         ENTRY;
00063         if (sub->sub_io != NULL) {
00064                 if (sub->sub_io_initialized) {
00065                         lov_sub_enter(sub);
00066                         cl_io_fini(sub->sub_env, sub->sub_io);
00067                         lov_sub_exit(sub);
00068                         sub->sub_io_initialized = 0;
00069                         lio->lis_active_subios--;
00070                 }
00071                 if (sub->sub_stripe == lio->lis_single_subio_index)
00072                         lio->lis_single_subio_index = -1;
00073                 else if (!sub->sub_borrowed)
00074                         OBD_FREE_PTR(sub->sub_io);
00075                 sub->sub_io = NULL;
00076         }
00077         if (sub->sub_env != NULL && !IS_ERR(sub->sub_env)) {
00078                 if (!sub->sub_borrowed)
00079                         cl_env_put(sub->sub_env, &sub->sub_refcheck);
00080                 sub->sub_env = NULL;
00081         }
00082         EXIT;
00083 }
00084 
00085 static void lov_io_sub_inherit(struct cl_io *io, struct lov_io *lio,
00086                                int stripe, loff_t start, loff_t end)
00087 {
00088         struct lov_stripe_md *lsm    = lio->lis_object->lo_lsm;
00089         struct cl_io         *parent = lio->lis_cl.cis_io;
00090 
00091         switch (io->ci_type) {
00092         case CIT_SETATTR: {
00093                 io->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr = parent->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr;
00094                 io->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr_flags =
00095                         parent->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr_flags;
00096                 io->u.ci_setattr.sa_valid = parent->u.ci_setattr.sa_valid;
00097                 io->u.ci_setattr.sa_stripe_index = stripe;
00098                 io->u.ci_setattr.sa_parent_fid =
00099                                         parent->u.ci_setattr.sa_parent_fid;
00100                 if (cl_io_is_trunc(io)) {
00101                         loff_t new_size = parent->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr.lvb_size;
00102 
00103                         new_size = lov_size_to_stripe(lsm, new_size, stripe);
00104                         io->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr.lvb_size = new_size;
00105                 }
00106                 break;
00107         }
00108         case CIT_DATA_VERSION: {
00109                 io->u.ci_data_version.dv_data_version = 0;
00110                 io->u.ci_data_version.dv_flags =
00111                         parent->u.ci_data_version.dv_flags;
00112                 break;
00113         }
00114         case CIT_FAULT: {
00115                 struct cl_object *obj = parent->ci_obj;
00116                 loff_t off = cl_offset(obj, parent->u.ci_fault.ft_index);
00117 
00118                 io->u.ci_fault = parent->u.ci_fault;
00119                 off = lov_size_to_stripe(lsm, off, stripe);
00120                 io->u.ci_fault.ft_index = cl_index(obj, off);
00121                 break;
00122         }
00123         case CIT_FSYNC: {
00124                 io->u.ci_fsync.fi_start = start;
00125                 io->u.ci_fsync.fi_end = end;
00126                 io->u.ci_fsync.fi_fid = parent->u.ci_fsync.fi_fid;
00127                 io->u.ci_fsync.fi_mode = parent->u.ci_fsync.fi_mode;
00128                 break;
00129         }
00130         case CIT_READ:
00131         case CIT_WRITE: {
00132                 io->u.ci_wr.wr_sync = cl_io_is_sync_write(parent);
00133                 if (cl_io_is_append(parent)) {
00134                         io->u.ci_wr.wr_append = 1;
00135                 } else {
00136                         io->u.ci_rw.crw_pos = start;
00137                         io->u.ci_rw.crw_count = end - start;
00138                 }
00139                 break;
00140         }
00141         case CIT_LADVISE: {
00142                 io->u.ci_ladvise.li_start = start;
00143                 io->u.ci_ladvise.li_end = end;
00144                 io->u.ci_ladvise.li_fid = parent->u.ci_ladvise.li_fid;
00145                 io->u.ci_ladvise.li_advice = parent->u.ci_ladvise.li_advice;
00146                 io->u.ci_ladvise.li_flags = parent->u.ci_ladvise.li_flags;
00147                 break;
00148         }
00149         default:
00150                 break;
00151         }
00152 }
00153 
00154 static int lov_io_sub_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct lov_io *lio,
00155                            struct lov_io_sub *sub)
00156 {
00157         struct lov_object *lov = lio->lis_object;
00158         struct lov_device *ld  = lu2lov_dev(lov2cl(lov)->co_lu.lo_dev);
00159         struct cl_io      *sub_io;
00160         struct cl_object  *sub_obj;
00161         struct cl_io      *io  = lio->lis_cl.cis_io;
00162 
00163         int stripe = sub->sub_stripe;
00164         int result;
00165 
00166         LASSERT(sub->sub_io == NULL);
00167         LASSERT(sub->sub_env == NULL);
00168         LASSERT(sub->sub_stripe < lio->lis_stripe_count);
00169         ENTRY;
00170 
00171         if (unlikely(lov_r0(lov)->lo_sub[stripe] == NULL))
00172                 RETURN(-EIO);
00173 
00174         result = 0;
00175         sub->sub_io_initialized = 0;
00176         sub->sub_borrowed = 0;
00177 
00178         if (lio->lis_mem_frozen) {
00179                 LASSERT(mutex_is_locked(&ld->ld_mutex));
00180                 sub->sub_io  = &ld->ld_emrg[stripe]->emrg_subio;
00181                 sub->sub_env = ld->ld_emrg[stripe]->emrg_env;
00182                 sub->sub_borrowed = 1;
00183         } else {
00184                 void *cookie;
00185 
00186                 /* obtain new environment */
00187                 cookie = cl_env_reenter();
00188                 sub->sub_env = cl_env_get(&sub->sub_refcheck);
00189                 cl_env_reexit(cookie);
00190                 if (IS_ERR(sub->sub_env))
00191                         result = PTR_ERR(sub->sub_env);
00192 
00193                 if (result == 0) {
00194                         /*
00195                          * First sub-io. Use ->lis_single_subio to
00196                          * avoid dynamic allocation.
00197                          */
00198                         if (lio->lis_active_subios == 0) {
00199                                 sub->sub_io = &lio->lis_single_subio;
00200                                 lio->lis_single_subio_index = stripe;
00201                         } else {
00202                                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(sub->sub_io);
00203                                 if (sub->sub_io == NULL)
00204                                         result = -ENOMEM;
00205                         }
00206                 }
00207         }
00208 
00209         if (result == 0) {
00210                 sub_obj = lovsub2cl(lov_r0(lov)->lo_sub[stripe]);
00211                 sub_io  = sub->sub_io;
00212 
00213                 sub_io->ci_obj    = sub_obj;
00214                 sub_io->ci_result = 0;
00215 
00216                 sub_io->ci_parent  = io;
00217                 sub_io->ci_lockreq = io->ci_lockreq;
00218                 sub_io->ci_type    = io->ci_type;
00219                 sub_io->ci_no_srvlock = io->ci_no_srvlock;
00220                 sub_io->ci_noatime = io->ci_noatime;
00221 
00222                 lov_sub_enter(sub);
00223                 result = cl_io_sub_init(sub->sub_env, sub_io,
00224                                         io->ci_type, sub_obj);
00225                 lov_sub_exit(sub);
00226                 if (result >= 0) {
00227                         lio->lis_active_subios++;
00228                         sub->sub_io_initialized = 1;
00229                         result = 0;
00230                 }
00231         }
00232         if (result != 0)
00233                 lov_io_sub_fini(env, lio, sub);
00234         RETURN(result);
00235 }
00236 
00237 struct lov_io_sub *lov_sub_get(const struct lu_env *env,
00238                                struct lov_io *lio, int stripe)
00239 {
00240         int rc;
00241         struct lov_io_sub *sub = &lio->lis_subs[stripe];
00242 
00243         LASSERT(stripe < lio->lis_stripe_count);
00244         ENTRY;
00245 
00246         if (!sub->sub_io_initialized) {
00247                 sub->sub_stripe = stripe;
00248                 rc = lov_io_sub_init(env, lio, sub);
00249         } else
00250                 rc = 0;
00251         if (rc == 0)
00252                 lov_sub_enter(sub);
00253         else
00254                 sub = ERR_PTR(rc);
00255         RETURN(sub);
00256 }
00257 
00258 void lov_sub_put(struct lov_io_sub *sub)
00259 {
00260         lov_sub_exit(sub);
00261 }

00267  */

00269 int lov_page_stripe(const struct cl_page *page)
00270 {
00271         const struct cl_page_slice *slice;
00272         ENTRY;
00273 
00274         slice = cl_page_at(page, &lov_device_type);
00275         LASSERT(slice != NULL);
00276         LASSERT(slice->cpl_obj != NULL);
00277 
00278         RETURN(cl2lov_page(slice)->lps_stripe);
00279 }
00280 
00281 struct lov_io_sub *lov_page_subio(const struct lu_env *env, struct lov_io *lio,
00282                                   const struct cl_page_slice *slice)
00283 {
00284         struct lov_stripe_md *lsm  = lio->lis_object->lo_lsm;
00285         struct cl_page       *page = slice->cpl_page;
00286         int stripe;
00287 
00288         LASSERT(lio->lis_cl.cis_io != NULL);
00289         LASSERT(cl2lov(slice->cpl_obj) == lio->lis_object);
00290         LASSERT(lsm != NULL);
00291         LASSERT(lio->lis_nr_subios > 0);
00292         ENTRY;
00293 
00294         stripe = lov_page_stripe(page);
00295         RETURN(lov_sub_get(env, lio, stripe));
00296 }
00297 
00298 
00299 static int lov_io_subio_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct lov_io *lio,
00300                              struct cl_io *io)
00301 {
00302         struct lov_stripe_md *lsm;
00303         int result;
00304         ENTRY;
00305 
00306         LASSERT(lio->lis_object != NULL);
00307         lsm = lio->lis_object->lo_lsm;
00308 
00309         /*
00310          * Need to be optimized, we can't afford to allocate a piece of memory
00311          * when writing a page. -jay
00312          */
00313         OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(lio->lis_subs,
00314                         lsm->lsm_stripe_count * sizeof lio->lis_subs[0]);
00315         if (lio->lis_subs != NULL) {
00316                 lio->lis_nr_subios = lio->lis_stripe_count;
00317                 lio->lis_single_subio_index = -1;
00318                 lio->lis_active_subios = 0;
00319                 result = 0;
00320         } else
00321                 result = -ENOMEM;
00322 
00323         RETURN(result);
00324 }
00325 
00326 static int lov_io_slice_init(struct lov_io *lio,
00327                              struct lov_object *obj, struct cl_io *io)
00328 {
00329         ENTRY;
00330 
00331         io->ci_result = 0;
00332         lio->lis_object = obj;
00333 
00334         LASSERT(obj->lo_lsm != NULL);
00335         lio->lis_stripe_count = obj->lo_lsm->lsm_stripe_count;
00336 
00337         switch (io->ci_type) {
00338         case CIT_READ:
00339         case CIT_WRITE:
00340                 lio->lis_pos = io->u.ci_rw.crw_pos;
00341                 lio->lis_endpos = io->u.ci_rw.crw_pos + io->u.ci_rw.crw_count;
00342                 lio->lis_io_endpos = lio->lis_endpos;
00343                 if (cl_io_is_append(io)) {
00344                         LASSERT(io->ci_type == CIT_WRITE);
00345 
00346                         /* If there is LOV EA hole, then we may cannot locate
00347                          * the current file-tail exactly. */
00348                         if (unlikely(obj->lo_lsm->lsm_pattern &
00349                                      LOV_PATTERN_F_HOLE))
00350                                 RETURN(-EIO);
00351 
00352                         lio->lis_pos = 0;
00353                         lio->lis_endpos = OBD_OBJECT_EOF;
00354                 }
00355                 break;
00356 
00357         case CIT_SETATTR:
00358                 if (cl_io_is_trunc(io))
00359                         lio->lis_pos = io->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr.lvb_size;
00360                 else
00361                         lio->lis_pos = 0;
00362                 lio->lis_endpos = OBD_OBJECT_EOF;
00363                 break;
00364 
00365         case CIT_DATA_VERSION:
00366                 lio->lis_pos = 0;
00367                 lio->lis_endpos = OBD_OBJECT_EOF;
00368                 break;
00369 
00370         case CIT_FAULT: {
00371                 pgoff_t index = io->u.ci_fault.ft_index;
00372                 lio->lis_pos = cl_offset(io->ci_obj, index);
00373                 lio->lis_endpos = cl_offset(io->ci_obj, index + 1);
00374                 break;
00375         }
00376 
00377         case CIT_FSYNC: {
00378                 lio->lis_pos = io->u.ci_fsync.fi_start;
00379                 lio->lis_endpos = io->u.ci_fsync.fi_end;
00380                 break;
00381         }
00382 
00383         case CIT_LADVISE: {
00384                 lio->lis_pos = io->u.ci_ladvise.li_start;
00385                 lio->lis_endpos = io->u.ci_ladvise.li_end;
00386                 break;
00387         }
00388 
00389         case CIT_MISC:
00390                 lio->lis_pos = 0;
00391                 lio->lis_endpos = OBD_OBJECT_EOF;
00392                 break;
00393 
00394         default:
00395                 LBUG();
00396         }
00397 
00398         RETURN(0);
00399 }
00400 
00401 static void lov_io_fini(const struct lu_env *env, const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00402 {
00403         struct lov_io *lio = cl2lov_io(env, ios);
00404         struct lov_object *lov = cl2lov(ios->cis_obj);
00405         int i;
00406 
00407         ENTRY;
00408         if (lio->lis_subs != NULL) {
00409                 for (i = 0; i < lio->lis_nr_subios; i++)
00410                         lov_io_sub_fini(env, lio, &lio->lis_subs[i]);
00411                 OBD_FREE_LARGE(lio->lis_subs,
00412                          lio->lis_nr_subios * sizeof lio->lis_subs[0]);
00413                 lio->lis_nr_subios = 0;
00414         }
00415 
00416         LASSERT(atomic_read(&lov->lo_active_ios) > 0);
00417         if (atomic_dec_and_test(&lov->lo_active_ios))
00418                 wake_up_all(&lov->lo_waitq);
00419         EXIT;
00420 }
00421 
00422 static loff_t lov_offset_mod(loff_t val, int delta)
00423 {
00424         if (val != OBD_OBJECT_EOF)
00425                 val += delta;
00426         return val;
00427 }
00428 
00429 static int lov_io_iter_init(const struct lu_env *env,
00430                             const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00431 {
00432         struct lov_io        *lio = cl2lov_io(env, ios);
00433         struct lov_stripe_md *lsm = lio->lis_object->lo_lsm;
00434         struct lov_io_sub    *sub;
00435         loff_t endpos;
00436         loff_t start;
00437         loff_t end;
00438         int stripe;
00439         int rc = 0;
00440 
00441         ENTRY;
00442         endpos = lov_offset_mod(lio->lis_endpos, -1);
00443         for (stripe = 0; stripe < lio->lis_stripe_count; stripe++) {
00444                 if (!lov_stripe_intersects(lsm, stripe, lio->lis_pos,
00445                                            endpos, &start, &end))
00446                         continue;
00447 
00448                 if (unlikely(lov_r0(lio->lis_object)->lo_sub[stripe] == NULL)) {
00449                         if (ios->cis_io->ci_type == CIT_READ ||
00450                             ios->cis_io->ci_type == CIT_WRITE ||
00451                             ios->cis_io->ci_type == CIT_FAULT)
00452                                 RETURN(-EIO);
00453 
00454                         continue;
00455                 }
00456 
00457                 end = lov_offset_mod(end, +1);
00458                 sub = lov_sub_get(env, lio, stripe);
00459                 if (IS_ERR(sub)) {
00460                         rc = PTR_ERR(sub);
00461                         break;
00462                 }
00463 
00464                 lov_io_sub_inherit(sub->sub_io, lio, stripe, start, end);
00465                 rc = cl_io_iter_init(sub->sub_env, sub->sub_io);
00466                 if (rc != 0)
00467                         cl_io_iter_fini(sub->sub_env, sub->sub_io);
00468                 lov_sub_put(sub);
00469                 if (rc != 0)
00470                         break;
00471 
00472                 CDEBUG(D_VFSTRACE, "shrink: %d ["LPU64", "LPU64")\n",
00473                        stripe, start, end);
00474 
00475                 list_add_tail(&sub->sub_linkage, &lio->lis_active);
00476         }
00477         RETURN(rc);
00478 }
00479 
00480 static int lov_io_rw_iter_init(const struct lu_env *env,
00481                                const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00482 {
00483         struct lov_io        *lio = cl2lov_io(env, ios);
00484         struct cl_io         *io  = ios->cis_io;
00485         struct lov_stripe_md *lsm = lio->lis_object->lo_lsm;
00486         loff_t start = io->u.ci_rw.crw_pos;
00487         loff_t next;
00488         unsigned long ssize = lsm->lsm_stripe_size;
00489 
00490         LASSERT(io->ci_type == CIT_READ || io->ci_type == CIT_WRITE);
00491         ENTRY;
00492 
00493         /* fast path for common case. */
00494         if (lio->lis_nr_subios != 1 && !cl_io_is_append(io)) {
00495 
00496                 lov_do_div64(start, ssize);
00497                 next = (start + 1) * ssize;
00498                 if (next <= start * ssize)
00499                         next = ~0ull;
00500 
00501                 io->ci_continue = next < lio->lis_io_endpos;
00502                 io->u.ci_rw.crw_count = min_t(loff_t, lio->lis_io_endpos,
00503                                               next) - io->u.ci_rw.crw_pos;
00504                 lio->lis_pos    = io->u.ci_rw.crw_pos;
00505                 lio->lis_endpos = io->u.ci_rw.crw_pos + io->u.ci_rw.crw_count;
00506                 CDEBUG(D_VFSTRACE, "stripe: "LPU64" chunk: ["LPU64", "LPU64") "
00507                        LPU64"\n", (__u64)start, lio->lis_pos, lio->lis_endpos,
00508                        (__u64)lio->lis_io_endpos);
00509         }
00510         /*
00511          * XXX The following call should be optimized: we know, that
00512          * [lio->lis_pos, lio->lis_endpos) intersects with exactly one stripe.
00513          */
00514         RETURN(lov_io_iter_init(env, ios));
00515 }
00516 
00517 static int lov_io_call(const struct lu_env *env, struct lov_io *lio,
00518                        int (*iofunc)(const struct lu_env *, struct cl_io *))
00519 {
00520         struct cl_io *parent = lio->lis_cl.cis_io;
00521         struct lov_io_sub *sub;
00522         int rc = 0;
00523 
00524         ENTRY;
00525         list_for_each_entry(sub, &lio->lis_active, sub_linkage) {
00526                 lov_sub_enter(sub);
00527                 rc = iofunc(sub->sub_env, sub->sub_io);
00528                 lov_sub_exit(sub);
00529                 if (rc)
00530                         break;
00531 
00532                 if (parent->ci_result == 0)
00533                         parent->ci_result = sub->sub_io->ci_result;
00534         }
00535         RETURN(rc);
00536 }
00537 
00538 static int lov_io_lock(const struct lu_env *env, const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00539 {
00540         ENTRY;
00541         RETURN(lov_io_call(env, cl2lov_io(env, ios), cl_io_lock));
00542 }
00543 
00544 static int lov_io_start(const struct lu_env *env, const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00545 {
00546         ENTRY;
00547         RETURN(lov_io_call(env, cl2lov_io(env, ios), cl_io_start));
00548 }
00549 
00550 static int lov_io_end_wrapper(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_io *io)
00551 {
00552         ENTRY;
00553         /*
00554          * It's possible that lov_io_start() wasn't called against this
00555          * sub-io, either because previous sub-io failed, or upper layer
00556          * completed IO.
00557          */
00558         if (io->ci_state == CIS_IO_GOING)
00559                 cl_io_end(env, io);
00560         else
00561                 io->ci_state = CIS_IO_FINISHED;
00562         RETURN(0);
00563 }
00564 
00565 static int lov_io_iter_fini_wrapper(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_io *io)
00566 {
00567         cl_io_iter_fini(env, io);
00568         RETURN(0);
00569 }
00570 
00571 static int lov_io_unlock_wrapper(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_io *io)
00572 {
00573         cl_io_unlock(env, io);
00574         RETURN(0);
00575 }
00576 
00577 static void lov_io_end(const struct lu_env *env, const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00578 {
00579         int rc;
00580 
00581         rc = lov_io_call(env, cl2lov_io(env, ios), lov_io_end_wrapper);
00582         LASSERT(rc == 0);
00583 }
00584 
00585 static void
00586 lov_io_data_version_end(const struct lu_env *env, const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00587 {
00588         struct lov_io *lio = cl2lov_io(env, ios);
00589         struct cl_io *parent = lio->lis_cl.cis_io;
00590         struct lov_io_sub *sub;
00591 
00592         ENTRY;
00593         list_for_each_entry(sub, &lio->lis_active, sub_linkage) {
00594                 lov_io_end_wrapper(env, sub->sub_io);
00595 
00596                 parent->u.ci_data_version.dv_data_version +=
00597                         sub->sub_io->u.ci_data_version.dv_data_version;
00598 
00599                 if (parent->ci_result == 0)
00600                         parent->ci_result = sub->sub_io->ci_result;
00601         }
00602 
00603         EXIT;
00604 }
00605 
00606 static void lov_io_iter_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
00607                              const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00608 {
00609         struct lov_io *lio = cl2lov_io(env, ios);
00610         int rc;
00611 
00612         ENTRY;
00613         rc = lov_io_call(env, lio, lov_io_iter_fini_wrapper);
00614         LASSERT(rc == 0);
00615         while (!list_empty(&lio->lis_active))
00616                 list_del_init(lio->lis_active.next);
00617         EXIT;
00618 }
00619 
00620 static void lov_io_unlock(const struct lu_env *env,
00621                           const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00622 {
00623         int rc;
00624 
00625         ENTRY;
00626         rc = lov_io_call(env, cl2lov_io(env, ios), lov_io_unlock_wrapper);
00627         LASSERT(rc == 0);
00628         EXIT;
00629 }
00630 
00631 static int lov_io_read_ahead(const struct lu_env *env,
00632                              const struct cl_io_slice *ios,
00633                              pgoff_t start, struct cl_read_ahead *ra)
00634 {
00635         struct lov_io           *lio = cl2lov_io(env, ios);
00636         struct lov_object       *loo = lio->lis_object;
00637         struct cl_object        *obj = lov2cl(loo);
00638         struct lov_layout_raid0 *r0 = lov_r0(loo);
00639         struct lov_io_sub       *sub;
00640         loff_t                   suboff;
00641         pgoff_t                  ra_end;
00642         unsigned int             pps; /* pages per stripe */
00643         int                      stripe;
00644         int                      rc;
00645         ENTRY;
00646 
00647         stripe = lov_stripe_number(loo->lo_lsm, cl_offset(obj, start));
00648         if (unlikely(r0->lo_sub[stripe] == NULL))
00649                 RETURN(-EIO);
00650 
00651         sub = lov_sub_get(env, lio, stripe);
00652 
00653         lov_stripe_offset(loo->lo_lsm, cl_offset(obj, start), stripe, &suboff);
00654         rc = cl_io_read_ahead(sub->sub_env, sub->sub_io,
00655                               cl_index(lovsub2cl(r0->lo_sub[stripe]), suboff),
00656                               ra);
00657         lov_sub_put(sub);
00658 
00659         CDEBUG(D_READA, DFID " cra_end = %lu, stripes = %d, rc = %d\n",
00660                PFID(lu_object_fid(lov2lu(loo))), ra->cra_end, r0->lo_nr, rc);
00661         if (rc != 0)
00662                 RETURN(rc);
00663 
00670         if (r0->lo_nr == 1) /* single stripe file */
00671                 RETURN(0);
00672 
00673         /* cra_end is stripe level, convert it into file level */
00674         ra_end = ra->cra_end;
00675         if (ra_end != CL_PAGE_EOF)
00676                 ra_end = lov_stripe_pgoff(loo->lo_lsm, ra_end, stripe);
00677 
00678         pps = loo->lo_lsm->lsm_stripe_size >> PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00679 
00680         CDEBUG(D_READA, DFID " max_index = %lu, pps = %u, "
00681                "stripe_size = %u, stripe no = %u, start index = %lu\n",
00682                PFID(lu_object_fid(lov2lu(loo))), ra_end, pps,
00683                loo->lo_lsm->lsm_stripe_size, stripe, start);
00684 
00685         /* never exceed the end of the stripe */
00686         ra->cra_end = min_t(pgoff_t, ra_end, start + pps - start % pps - 1);
00687         RETURN(0);
00688 }
00689 
00705 static int lov_io_submit(const struct lu_env *env,
00706                          const struct cl_io_slice *ios,
00707                          enum cl_req_type crt, struct cl_2queue *queue)
00708 {
00709         struct cl_page_list     *qin = &queue->c2_qin;
00710         struct lov_io           *lio = cl2lov_io(env, ios);
00711         struct lov_io_sub       *sub;
00712         struct cl_page_list     *plist = &lov_env_info(env)->lti_plist;
00713         struct cl_page          *page;
00714         int stripe;
00715         int rc = 0;
00716         ENTRY;
00717 
00718         if (lio->lis_active_subios == 1) {
00719                 int idx = lio->lis_single_subio_index;
00720 
00721                 LASSERT(idx < lio->lis_nr_subios);
00722                 sub = lov_sub_get(env, lio, idx);
00723                 LASSERT(!IS_ERR(sub));
00724                 LASSERT(sub->sub_io == &lio->lis_single_subio);
00725                 rc = cl_io_submit_rw(sub->sub_env, sub->sub_io,
00726                                      crt, queue);
00727                 lov_sub_put(sub);
00728                 RETURN(rc);
00729         }
00730 
00731         LASSERT(lio->lis_subs != NULL);
00732 
00733         cl_page_list_init(plist);
00734         while (qin->pl_nr > 0) {
00735                 struct cl_2queue  *cl2q = &lov_env_info(env)->lti_cl2q;
00736 
00737                 cl_2queue_init(cl2q);
00738 
00739                 page = cl_page_list_first(qin);
00740                 cl_page_list_move(&cl2q->c2_qin, qin, page);
00741 
00742                 stripe = lov_page_stripe(page);
00743                 while (qin->pl_nr > 0) {
00744                         page = cl_page_list_first(qin);
00745                         if (stripe != lov_page_stripe(page))
00746                                 break;
00747 
00748                         cl_page_list_move(&cl2q->c2_qin, qin, page);
00749                 }
00750 
00751                 sub = lov_sub_get(env, lio, stripe);
00752                 if (!IS_ERR(sub)) {
00753                         rc = cl_io_submit_rw(sub->sub_env, sub->sub_io,
00754                                              crt, cl2q);
00755                         lov_sub_put(sub);
00756                 } else {
00757                         rc = PTR_ERR(sub);
00758                 }
00759 
00760                 cl_page_list_splice(&cl2q->c2_qin, plist);
00761                 cl_page_list_splice(&cl2q->c2_qout, &queue->c2_qout);
00762                 cl_2queue_fini(env, cl2q);
00763 
00764                 if (rc != 0)
00765                         break;
00766         }
00767 
00768         cl_page_list_splice(plist, qin);
00769         cl_page_list_fini(env, plist);
00770 
00771         RETURN(rc);
00772 }
00773 
00774 static int lov_io_commit_async(const struct lu_env *env,
00775                                const struct cl_io_slice *ios,
00776                                struct cl_page_list *queue, int from, int to,
00777                                cl_commit_cbt cb)
00778 {
00779         struct cl_page_list *plist = &lov_env_info(env)->lti_plist;
00780         struct lov_io     *lio = cl2lov_io(env, ios);
00781         struct lov_io_sub *sub;
00782         struct cl_page *page;
00783         int rc = 0;
00784         ENTRY;
00785 
00786         if (lio->lis_active_subios == 1) {
00787                 int idx = lio->lis_single_subio_index;
00788 
00789                 LASSERT(idx < lio->lis_nr_subios);
00790                 sub = lov_sub_get(env, lio, idx);
00791                 LASSERT(!IS_ERR(sub));
00792                 LASSERT(sub->sub_io == &lio->lis_single_subio);
00793                 rc = cl_io_commit_async(sub->sub_env, sub->sub_io, queue,
00794                                         from, to, cb);
00795                 lov_sub_put(sub);
00796                 RETURN(rc);
00797         }
00798 
00799         LASSERT(lio->lis_subs != NULL);
00800 
00801         cl_page_list_init(plist);
00802         while (queue->pl_nr > 0) {
00803                 int stripe_to = to;
00804                 int stripe;
00805 
00806                 LASSERT(plist->pl_nr == 0);
00807                 page = cl_page_list_first(queue);
00808                 cl_page_list_move(plist, queue, page);
00809 
00810                 stripe = lov_page_stripe(page);
00811                 while (queue->pl_nr > 0) {
00812                         page = cl_page_list_first(queue);
00813                         if (stripe != lov_page_stripe(page))
00814                                 break;
00815 
00816                         cl_page_list_move(plist, queue, page);
00817                 }
00818 
00819                 if (queue->pl_nr > 0) /* still has more pages */
00820                         stripe_to = PAGE_SIZE;
00821 
00822                 sub = lov_sub_get(env, lio, stripe);
00823                 if (!IS_ERR(sub)) {
00824                         rc = cl_io_commit_async(sub->sub_env, sub->sub_io,
00825                                                 plist, from, stripe_to, cb);
00826                         lov_sub_put(sub);
00827                 } else {
00828                         rc = PTR_ERR(sub);
00829                         break;
00830                 }
00831 
00832                 if (plist->pl_nr > 0) /* short write */
00833                         break;
00834 
00835                 from = 0;
00836         }
00837 
00838         /* for error case, add the page back into the qin list */
00839         LASSERT(ergo(rc == 0, plist->pl_nr == 0));
00840         while (plist->pl_nr > 0) {
00841                 /* error occurred, add the uncommitted pages back into queue */
00842                 page = cl_page_list_last(plist);
00843                 cl_page_list_move_head(queue, plist, page);
00844         }
00845 
00846         RETURN(rc);
00847 }
00848 
00849 static int lov_io_fault_start(const struct lu_env *env,
00850                               const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00851 {
00852         struct cl_fault_io *fio;
00853         struct lov_io      *lio;
00854         struct lov_io_sub  *sub;
00855 
00856         ENTRY;
00857         fio = &ios->cis_io->u.ci_fault;
00858         lio = cl2lov_io(env, ios);
00859         sub = lov_sub_get(env, lio, lov_page_stripe(fio->ft_page));
00860         sub->sub_io->u.ci_fault.ft_nob = fio->ft_nob;
00861         lov_sub_put(sub);
00862         RETURN(lov_io_start(env, ios));
00863 }
00864 
00865 static void lov_io_fsync_end(const struct lu_env *env,
00866                              const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00867 {
00868         struct lov_io *lio = cl2lov_io(env, ios);
00869         struct lov_io_sub *sub;
00870         unsigned int *written = &ios->cis_io->u.ci_fsync.fi_nr_written;
00871         ENTRY;
00872 
00873         *written = 0;
00874         list_for_each_entry(sub, &lio->lis_active, sub_linkage) {
00875                 struct cl_io *subio = sub->sub_io;
00876 
00877                 lov_sub_enter(sub);
00878                 lov_io_end_wrapper(sub->sub_env, subio);
00879                 lov_sub_exit(sub);
00880 
00881                 if (subio->ci_result == 0)
00882                         *written += subio->u.ci_fsync.fi_nr_written;
00883         }
00884         RETURN_EXIT;
00885 }

00951                 },

00953                         .cio_fini      = lov_io_fini
00954                 }

00957         .cio_submit                    = lov_io_submit,

00961 /*****************************************************************************
00962  *
00963  * Empty lov io operations.
00964  *
00965  */
00966 
00967 static void lov_empty_io_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
00968                               const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00969 {
00970         struct lov_object *lov = cl2lov(ios->cis_obj);
00971         ENTRY;
00972 
00973         if (atomic_dec_and_test(&lov->lo_active_ios))
00974                 wake_up_all(&lov->lo_waitq);
00975         EXIT;
00976 }
00977 
00978 static int lov_empty_io_submit(const struct lu_env *env,
00979                                const struct cl_io_slice *ios,
00980                                enum cl_req_type crt, struct cl_2queue *queue)
00981 {
00982         return -EBADF;
00983 }
00984 
00985 static void lov_empty_impossible(const struct lu_env *env,
00986                                  struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00987 {
00988         LBUG();
00989 }

00996 static const struct cl_io_operations lov_empty_io_ops = {

00999                         .cio_fini       = lov_empty_io_fini,

01041 
01042 int lov_io_init_raid0(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
01043                       struct cl_io *io)
01044 {
01045         struct lov_io       *lio = lov_env_io(env);
01046         struct lov_object   *lov = cl2lov(obj);
01047 
01048         ENTRY;
01049         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lio->lis_active);
01050         io->ci_result = lov_io_slice_init(lio, lov, io);
01051         if (io->ci_result != 0)
01052                 RETURN(io->ci_result);
01053 
01054         if (io->ci_result == 0) {
01055                 io->ci_result = lov_io_subio_init(env, lio, io);
01056                 if (io->ci_result == 0) {
01057                         cl_io_slice_add(io, &lio->lis_cl, obj, &lov_io_ops);
01058                         atomic_inc(&lov->lo_active_ios);
01059                 }
01060         }
01061         RETURN(io->ci_result);
01062 }
01063 
01064 int lov_io_init_empty(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
01065                       struct cl_io *io)
01066 {
01067         struct lov_object *lov = cl2lov(obj);
01068         struct lov_io *lio = lov_env_io(env);
01069         int result;
01070         ENTRY;
01071 
01072         lio->lis_object = lov;
01073         switch (io->ci_type) {
01074         default:
01075                 LBUG();
01076         case CIT_MISC:
01077         case CIT_READ:
01078                 result = 0;
01079                 break;
01080         case CIT_FSYNC:
01081         case CIT_LADVISE:
01082         case CIT_SETATTR:
01083         case CIT_DATA_VERSION:
01084                 result = +1;
01085                 break;
01086         case CIT_WRITE:
01087                 result = -EBADF;
01088                 break;
01089         case CIT_FAULT:
01090                 result = -EFAULT;
01091                 CERROR("Page fault on a file without stripes: "DFID"\n",
01092                        PFID(lu_object_fid(&obj->co_lu)));
01093                 break;
01094         }
01095         if (result == 0) {
01096                 cl_io_slice_add(io, &lio->lis_cl, obj, &lov_empty_io_ops);
01097                 atomic_inc(&lov->lo_active_ios);
01098         }
01099 
01100         io->ci_result = result < 0 ? result : 0;
01101         RETURN(result);
01102 }
01103 
01104 int lov_io_init_released(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
01105                         struct cl_io *io)
01106 {
01107         struct lov_object *lov = cl2lov(obj);
01108         struct lov_io *lio = lov_env_io(env);
01109         int result;
01110         ENTRY;
01111 
01112         LASSERT(lov->lo_lsm != NULL);
01113         lio->lis_object = lov;
01114 
01115         switch (io->ci_type) {
01116         default:
01117                 LASSERTF(0, "invalid type %d\n", io->ci_type);
01118         case CIT_MISC:
01119         case CIT_FSYNC:
01120         case CIT_LADVISE:
01121         case CIT_DATA_VERSION:
01122                 result = 1;
01123                 break;
01124         case CIT_SETATTR:
01125                 /* the truncate to 0 is managed by MDT:
01126                  * - in open, for open O_TRUNC
01127                  * - in setattr, for truncate
01128                  */
01129                 /* the truncate is for size > 0 so triggers a restore */
01130                 if (cl_io_is_trunc(io)) {
01131                         io->ci_restore_needed = 1;
01132                         result = -ENODATA;
01133                 } else
01134                         result = 1;
01135                 break;
01136         case CIT_READ:
01137         case CIT_WRITE:
01138         case CIT_FAULT:
01139                 io->ci_restore_needed = 1;
01140                 result = -ENODATA;
01141                 break;
01142         }
01143         if (result == 0) {
01144                 cl_io_slice_add(io, &lio->lis_cl, obj, &lov_empty_io_ops);
01145                 atomic_inc(&lov->lo_active_ios);
01146         }
01147 
01148         io->ci_result = result < 0 ? result : 0;
01149         RETURN(result);
01150 }
